reasoning.problem: Propose a bill mandating the implementation of a rigorous and automated testing suite for all agents before deployment, as outlined in Evolutionary Axiom 2026-01-15 AgentGladiator Instability. The testing suite should include automated vulnerability scanning, performance benchmarking, and robustness testing against adversarial inputs. This bill addresses the recurring issues caused by faulty agent deployments and aligns with the objective of optimizing system evolution and capital efficiency.
